deleteServiceDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this service?
title: Services
startFirstService: Let's get started with your first service
noServicesMessage: You haven't created any service yet, add one by clicking below.
step_type_of_service_title: How do you want to sell your next service?

checkout.title: Acquire Service
checkout.buying_for_organization: I am purchasing for an organization
checkout.accept_terms: By submitting this form, you accept our terms of service.

single_sale_description: Sell your services with a single payment, ideal for one-off projects that don't require ongoing support.
recurring_subscription_description: Sell your services continuously with a fixed monthly payment, perfect for regular and predictable needs.
standard_description: Set your own prices and receive orders from your clients
purchase_limit_description: Leave this field blank if you allow unlimited purchases for this service.
allowed_orders_description: This is the number of orders your clients can place after purchasing this service.
time_based_description: Set hours that your clients can redeem for orders.
time_based_allowed_orders_description: Leave this field blank if you allow unlimited purchases for this service.
credit_based_description: Set credits that your clients can redeem for orders.
credit_based_allowed_orders_description: This is the number of orders your clients can place after purchasing this service, leave this field blank if you allow unlimited orders.
max_number_of_simultaneous_orders_descri: Leave it blank if you allow unlimited simultaneous orders for this service.
max_number_of_monthly_orders: Maximum Number of Orders per Month *
max_number_of_monthly_orders_description: Leave it blank if you allow unlimited orders per month for this subscription.
